content.prompt: KÃ¤the Kollwitz most probably chose woodcut as the medium for her Memorial Sheet for Karl Liebknecht because woodcuts

choices.label: are more similar to drawings than are prints made with other processes
can be printed more quickly than prints made with other processes
provide the possibility of using subtle gradations of tone
allow for strong contrast and clear expressive shapes

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
